text: aur takaleef mein giraphtaar kiya taaki vah log (hamaaree baaragaah mein) gidagidae to jab un (ke sar) par hamaara azaab aa khada hua to vah log kyon nahin gidagidae (ki ham azaab dapha kar dete) magar unake dil to sakht ho gae the or unakee kaarastaaniyon ko shaitaan ne aaraasta kar dikhaaya tha (phir kyonkar gidagidaate)
